room_title: Escape room "Relativity Room: 1939" by Smart Rooms in Lincoln
review: Had a great time with a few friends in the Relativity Room! Kind of got off to a slow start but eventually got out with the help of a couple hints, would definitely recommend to others.

room_title: Escape room "Relativity Room: 1939" by Smart Rooms in Lincoln
review: 6 of us were having a great time! We had to use our brains & instincts. It was very interesting, all the scientific & historical clues. I highly recommend this activity. Good times!

room_title: Escape room "Relativity Room: 1939" by Smart Rooms in Lincoln
review: Fabulous Fun!The owner himself was there to talk us through the process and congratulated us when we made it out!Highly recommend.Can't wait for the next round of rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Relativity Room: 1939" by Smart Rooms in Lincoln
review: Bought on a leap of faith for this to be the premier activity for family for Thanksgiving weekend. We were blown away. Fantastic in every way, can't recommend enough. Owner was very friendly with the right amount of helpfulness and intrigue. We didn't even care that we technically were not escapees, though we did end up solving it.

room_title: Escape room "Relativity Room: 1939" by Smart Rooms in Lincoln
review: I went with a group of co-workers for a work outing and it was a fantastic time! I'm one of those people that used to play online escape rooms all the time and to do it in person was pretty epic. The room was challenging and fun and we were so happy we figured everything out in time to escape!
